Author: ca333#0118
Content:
we tried to create something that teaches the KMD technology. if we are very precise then you actually wouldnt really need Agama - you should have used it - yes, and we wish/want you to use it... because we want to educate you on everything blockchain related and also KMD related (KMD software, etc.) 
But what i am saying is - all it takes was some very basic crypto-knowledge. (privkey derivations from seed, sha256, etc.). And I ve posted the essential detail here: https://discordapp.com/channels/412898016371015680/542089680544595998/544125519084650507

Author: ca333#0118
Content: please check it out - if you still dont really know the background of the privkey derivation from the seed, etc. then read it up and plz ASK us. just post in here. there is nothing such as a stupid question. every serious question is justified.

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
Wen Moon Puzzle

Wen Moon was a chinese McDonald's manager. After hard work week he got drunk ... ) 


And sent last 0.5 DEX from his wallet to this address https://dex.kmdexplorer.io/address/RKvq6XqCU7TwKjqkGYzbDL6cBgnhJQqo2u 
and forget about it. 

But in 2045, when 1 DEX = 500 BTC he remember about it and start trying to recover his funds ... 

The only one thing that he remember about "sent day" was that this is end of week and he was very drunk ))
Help Wen Moon became rich again )))
